content:
=== Sprite Mapping ===
avatar -> 'a'
background -> '.'
blackhole background -> 'b'
turret background -> 't'
emptyPlanet background -> 'p'
nebula background -> 'w'
blackhole -> '@'
bomb turret -> '#'
emptyPlanet -> '$'
nebula -> '%'
turret -> '&'

=== Current State ===
=== Map in Natural language ===
Each line shows entity at (row, col).
In rotated version, row emphasizes vertical (up-down).
